Notes: This package req. npp.7.5.1.Installer.exe that can be downloaded from https://notepad-plus-plus.org/download/v7.5.1.html
Notepad++ start initially always with English user interface and the end-user can change language manually via Settings|Preferences|General|Localization
The language setting persists in the user profile at %AppData%\Notepad++\nativeLang.xml
If you want to pre-configure a language other than English the desired language file from %ProgramFiles%\Notepad++\localization can be copied as
This logic has been implemented via ActiveSetup into this package
